data.title: Town Without Pity
data.meta_description: Four American soldiers stationed near a German village face death in the rape of a local girl and are defended by outside counsel Major Steve Garrett....
data.text: Golden Globes, LLC (“Golden Globes”) uses first and third-party technologies to enable PMC and third-parties to collect information about you and your interactions with our sites and services (including clicks, cursor movements and screen recordings). Learn more HERE. By continuing to use our sites or services, you agree to our Terms of Use (including the class action waiver and arbitration provisions) and Privacy Policy, which have recently changed.
